mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_DTNUM /*주문상세번호*/ , ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , PD_CODE /*제품코드*/ , PD_NAME /*제품명*/ , ORDER_QTY /*주문 수량*/ , ORDER_AMT /*주문금액*/ , PDDC_VAL /*제품할인 값*/ , PD_PRICE /*상품가격*/ , PDDC_GUBN /*상품할인구분*/ , (SELECT CUT_UNIT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDCUTXM WHERE PD_CODE = A.PD_CODE AND SEQ = PD_CUT_SEQ ) AS PD_CUT_SEQ , NVL ( (SELECT COMDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COMCODXD WHERE COMM_CODE = 'OPTION_GUBN' AND COMD_CODE = A.OPTION_CODE ), (SELECT OPTDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_OPTCODXD M, POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM N WHERE M.OPTD_CODE = A.OPTION_CODE AND N.PD_CODE = A.PD_CODE AND M.OPTM_CODE = N.OPTION_GUBN) ) AS OPTION_CODE , SUPR_ID , DLVY_TDN , DLVY_CON , ORDER_CON , LINK_ORDER_KEY , NVL( (SELECT COMDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COMCODXD WHERE COMM_CODE = 'DLVY_COM' AND COMD_CODE = A.DLVY_COM), A.DLVY_COM) AS DLVY_COM , CASE WHEN A.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_02' THEN A.PD_PRICE - A.PDDC_VAL WHEN A.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_03' THEN A.PD_PRICE - (A.PD_PRICE * (A.PDDC_VAL/100)) ELSE A.PD_PRICE END REAL_PRICE /*실제 제품값*/ FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD A /*주문정보 상세*/ WHERE 1=1 AND ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} AND ORDER_DTNUM = #{ORDER_DTNUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM SET ORDER_AMT = ( SELECT SUM(ORDER_AMT) FROM TPOLARBEAR.B_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM} ) + DLVY_AMT, PAY_AMT = CASE WHEN PAY_AMT IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE (SELECT SUM(ORDER_AMT) FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}) + DLVY_AMT END, MOD_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM ,A.ORDER_DATE ,A.ORDER_DTM ,A.ORIGIN_NUM ,A.RFND_CON ,A.PAY_METD ,A.MEMB_ID ,(SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.MEMB_ID) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_NM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM A WHERE
POLARBEAR.FC_GET_REFUND_YN(A.ORDER_NUM,#{MEMB_ID}, 'RFND_CON_03') = 'Y'
POLARBEAR.FC_GET_REFUND_YN(A.ORDER_NUM,#{MEMB_ID}, 'SUPR_RFND_CON_03') = 'Y'
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.ORDER_NUM ,TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( ORDER_DATE, DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE), 8, 'YYYYMMDD', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')), DECODE(LENGTH(ORDER_DATE), 8, 'yyyy-MM-dd', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS')) AS ORDER_DATE ,A.ORDER_DTM ,A.MEMB_ID ,(SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.MEMB_ID) FROM DUAL) AS MEMB_NM
,(SELECT SUM(RFND_AMT) FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM=A.ORDER_NUM AND ORDER_CON='ORDER_CON_07' AND SUPR_ID=#{LOGIN_SUPR_ID}) AS ORDER_AMT
,(SELECT SUM(RFND_AMT) FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM=A.ORDER_NUM AND ORDER_CON='ORDER_CON_07') AS ORDER_AMT
,A.DLVY_AMT ,A.ORDER_CON ,(SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.ORDER_CON) FROM DUAL) AS ORDER_CON_NM ,A.PAY_METD ,(SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.PAY_METD) FROM DUAL) AS PAY_METD_NM ,A.RFND_REQDTM ,A.RFND_CON ,(SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.RFND_CON) FROM DUAL) AS RFND_CON_NM ,A.RFND_MSG ,(SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM (A.RFND_MSG) FROM DUAL) AS RFND_MSG_NM ,A.CNCL_MSG ,A.DLVY_TDN ,POLARBEAR.FC_GET_REFUND_PRODUCT_OK(A.ORDER_NUM, #{MEMB_ID}) AS PD_NAME ,(SELECT COUNT(*)-1 FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD WHERE ORDER_NUM = A.ORDER_NUM) AS count ,A.REGP_ID ,A.REG_DTM ,A.MODP_ID ,A.MOD_DTM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM A WHERE
POLARBEAR.FC_GET_REFUND_YN(A.ORDER_NUM, #{MEMB_ID}, 'SUPR_RFND_CON_03') = 'Y'
POLARBEAR.FC_GET_REFUND_YN(A.ORDER_NUM, #{MEMB_ID}, 'RFND_CON_03') = 'Y'
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT RETURN_NUM /*반품번호*/ , TO_CHAR( TO_DATE( RETURN_DATE , DECODE(LENGTH(RETURN_DATE), 8, 'YYYYMMDD', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')) ,DECODE(LENGTH(RETURN_DATE), 8, 'yyyy-MM-dd', 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:SS') ) AS RETURN_DATE /*주문일자*/ , A.MEMB_ID /*회원ID (주문자)*/ , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(A.MEMB_ID) AS MEMB_NM /*회원ID명(주문자)*/ , A.RETURN_AMT /*반품금액*/ , A.ORDER_NUM /*주문번호*/ , A.ORDER_CON /*주문상태*/ , A.CNCL_CON /*취소상태*/ , A.CNCL_REQDTM , A.DLVY_AMT /*배송비*/ , A.REGP_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.MODP_ID , A.MOD_DTM , B.PAY_METD , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(A.ORDER_CON) FROM DUAL) AS ORDER_CON_NM /*주문상태 명*/ , (SELECT POLARBEAR.FC_GET_COMCOD_NM(B.PAY_METD) FROM DUAL) AS PAY_METD_NM FROM POLARBEAR.TB_RTODINFOXM A INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM B ON A.ORDER_NUM = B.ORDER_NUM ) WHERE RETURN_NUM = #{RETURN_NUM}
mapper.update: UPDATE POLARBEAR.TB_RTODINFOXD SET RETURN_QTY = #{RETURN_QTY}, RETURN_GBN = #{RETURN_GBN}, RETURN_AMT = #{RETURN_AMT}, MODP_ID = #{MODP_ID}, MOD_DTM = SYSDATE WHERE RETURN_DTNUM = #{RETURN_DTNUM} AND RETURN_NUM = #{RETURN_NUM}

SELECT A.ORDER_NUM ,B.ORDER_DTNUM ,A.DLVY_AMT ,A.MEMB_ID ,B.PD_CODE ,CASE WHEN B.OPTION2_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN B.PD_NAME || ' (' || B.OPTION1_NAME || ':' || B.OPTION1_VALUE || ' ' || B.OPTION2_NAME || ':' || B.OPTION2_VALUE || ')' WHEN B.OPTION1_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN B.PD_NAME || ' (' || B.OPTION1_NAME || ':' || B.OPTION1_VALUE || ')' ELSE B.PD_NAME END PD_NAME ,B.PD_PRICE ,B.PDDC_GUBN ,B.PDDC_VAL ,B.BOX_PDDC_GUBN ,B.BOX_PDDC_VAL ,(SELECT CUT_UNIT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_PDCUTXM WHERE PD_CODE = B.PD_CODE AND SEQ = B.PD_CUT_SEQ ) AS PD_CUT_SEQ_UNIT ,B.PD_CUT_SEQ ,NVL( (SELECT COMDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_COMCODXD WHERE COMM_CODE = 'OPTION_GUBN' AND COMD_CODE = B.OPTION_CODE ), (SELECT OPTDCD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_OPTCODXD M, POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM N WHERE M.OPTD_CODE = B.OPTION_CODE AND N.PD_CODE = B.PD_CODE AND M.OPTM_CODE = N.OPTION_GUBN) ) AS OPTION_NAME ,B.OPTION_CODE ,CASE WHEN B.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_02' THEN B.PD_PRICE - B.PDDC_VAL WHEN B.PDDC_GUBN = 'PDDC_GUBN_03' THEN B.PD_PRICE - (B.PD_PRICE * (B.PDDC_VAL/100)) ELSE B.PD_PRICE END REAL_PRICE ,B.BOX_PDDC_GUBN ,B.BOX_PDDC_VAL ,C.INPUT_CNT ,OPTION1_NAME ,OPTION1_VALUE ,OPTION2_NAME ,OPTION2_VALUE ,C.BUNDLE_CNT ,C.INPUT_CNT ,NVL(B.ORDER_QTY, 0) + NVL(R.ORDER_QTY, 0) AS ORDER_QTY ,NVL(B.ORDER_AMT, 0) + NVL(R.ORDER_AMT, 0) AS ORDER_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM A INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD B ON A.ORDER_NUM = B.ORDER_NUM INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_PDINFOXM C ON B.PD_CODE = C.PD_CODE INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_MBINFOXM M ON A.MEMB_ID = M.MEMB_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT O.CNCL_MSG AS ORDER_NUM ,O.ORDER_NUM AS ORIGIN_NUM ,R.PD_CODE ,R.PD_NAME ,R.PD_PRICE ,R.ORDER_QTY ,R.ORDER_AMT FROM POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM O INNER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXD R ON O.ORDER_NUM = R.ORDER_NUM AND O.ORDER_CON = 'ORDER_CON_07' WHERE 1=1 AND O.CNCL_MSG = #{ORDER_NUM} ) R ON A.ORDER_NUM = R.ORDER_NUM AND B.PD_CODE = R.PD_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT INFO.* ,ODINFO.ORDER_DATE FROM ( SELECT RETURN_NUM , RETURN_DATE , MEMB_ID , POLARBEAR.FC_GET_MEMBID_NM(MEMB_ID) AS MEMB_NM /*회원ID명(주문자)*/ , RETURN_AMT , ORDER_CON , CNCL_CON , CNCL_REQDTM , ORDER_NUM , DLVY_AMT , REGP_ID , REG_DTM , MODP_ID , MOD_DTM , (SELECT COUNT(*)-1 FROM POLARBEAR.TB_RTODINFOXD WHERE RETURN_NUM = RTOD.RETURN_NUM) AS count /*주문 제품 갯수*/ , (SELECT PD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_RTODINFOXD WHERE RETURN_NUM = RTOD.RETURN_NUM AND ROWNUM = 1) AS PD_NAME FROM POLARBEAR.TB_RTODINFOXM RTOD ) INFO LEFT OUTER JOIN POLARBEAR.TB_ODINFOXM ODINFO ON INFO.ORDER_NUM = ODINFO.ORDER_NUM ) WHERE 1=1 AND ORDER_NUM = #{ORDER_NUM}
